se.nicklasgavelin.sphero
Class Robot.RobotMovement

java.lang.Object
  se.nicklasgavelin.sphero.Robot.RobotMovement
Enclosing class:
Robot
public class Robot.RobotMovement
extends java.lang.Object

Holds the robot position, rotation rate and the drive algorithm used. All the internal values may be accessed with the get methods that are available.

Author:
Nicklas Gavelin

Method Summary
 DriveAlgorithm getDriveAlgorithm()
          Returns the current drive algorithm that is used to calculate the velocity and motorHeading when running .drive on Robot
 float getHeading()
          Returns the current motorHeading of the robot
 float getRotationRate()
          Returns the current rotation rate of the robot.
 boolean getStop()
          Returns the current motorStop value of the robot.
 float getVelocity()
          Returns the current velocity of the robot

Method Detail

getHeading

public float getHeading()
Returns the current motorHeading of the robot

Returns:
The current motorHeading of the robot (0-360)

getVelocity

public float getVelocity()
Returns the current velocity of the robot

Returns:
The current velocity (0-1)

getRotationRate

public float getRotationRate()
Returns the current rotation rate of the robot.

Returns:
The current rotation rate (0-1)

getStop

public boolean getStop()
Returns the current motorStop value of the robot. True means the robot is stopped, false means it's moving with a certain velocity

Returns:
True if moving, false otherwise

getDriveAlgorithm

public DriveAlgorithm getDriveAlgorithm()
Returns the current drive algorithm that is used to calculate the velocity and motorHeading when running .drive on Robot

Returns:
The current drive algorithm
